artist: Artist: Unknown Spanish, late 18th - early 19th century
description: UL corner is the Duque's Coat of Arms. This is also found on the set of Chinese Export china made for him (85.42.4.1-158), without the papal decoration.
inscription:
\"Ecce beatificamus eos qui sustinuerunt\" [James 5:11]
\"Laudemus viros gloriosos et parentes nostros in generatione sua\" [Ecclesiasticus 44]
markings: Note: there was an inscription on the back of the painting which Mrs. Northrup had painted over when the painting was relined.
title: Portrait of the Duque de Agrada
